tutorial_desc: Lays the preliminary story and shows how to drop towers
id_nextWaveSoon: Thank goodness HQ sent someone like you to help us.  The next wave of robots will be on us soon.
id_shoreUpDefenses: We've got some towers in place already to waylay and destroy them.  The two towers you brought will help shore up our defenses.
id_dragFirstTower: Go ahead and drag one of the two pea shooters onto the screen.  Put them anywhere, but I'd suggest adding them to the first set of three, what I call 'the maze'
id_goodFirstPlacement: Excellent.  Now add the second tower.
id_okayFirstPlacement: Okay.  That should work.  Add the second tower and weâ€™ll be in business.
id_secondTowerPlacement: And now we wait for the next wave.  May our towers bring us strength.
id_badTowerPlacement: We can't completely block the robots off.  They'll go bezerk and attack the towers themselves - we'll be helpless!
id_cant_skip_ahead2: This button is for when all of your towers are in place.  We still have two towers left to place, so don't hit this quite yet.
id_cant_skip_ahead1: This button is for when all of your towers are in place.  We still have a tower left to place.
id_nowPushButton: Go ahead and push the button when your towers are how you like them.  May they keep us safe.
